Publications

  • Supply Chain Disruptions and Containerized Agricultural Exports From California Ports. Applied Economic Perspectives and Policy, 45(2), 1051-1071.
    Carter, Colin A., Sandro Steinbach, and Xiting Zhuang. https://doi.org/10.1002/aepp.13311

    Steinbach, Sandro and Xiting Zhuang.
    http://doi.org/10.1002/aepp.13399

    Steinbach, Sandro and Xiting Zhuang.
    https://doi.org/10.1002/agr.21809

  • U.S. Agricultural Exports and the 2022 Mississippi River Drought. Agribusiness, 2023 (Forthcoming).
    Steinbach, Sandro and Xiting Zhuang.

  • ‘Containergeddon’ and California Agriculture. University of California Giannini Foundation of Agricultural, University of California, Davis. 2021. ARE Update 25(2): 1–4.
    Carter, Colin A. Carter, Sandro Steinbach, and Xiting Zhuang.
    https://giannini.ucop.edu/filer/file/1640021835/20297/

    Schweizer, Heidi, Sandro Steinbach and Xiting Zhuang, 2022.
    10.22004/ag.econ.329728

  • Retaliatory Tariffs and Container Shipping Disruptions Cause Considerable Trade Damages to California’s Almond Industry. Choices: The Magazine of Food, Farm, and Resource Issues, AAEA, 38(1-9). 2023
    Steinbach, Sandro and Xiting Zhuang.
    10.22004/ag.econ.337188

  • Urbanization Process and Carbon Emission in China Based on Semi-Parametric Spatial Lags Model. Logistics Engineering and Management. 2016.
    Xiting, Zhuang.
